name: everyday cotton cardigan
notes:
this adult sized crochet cardigan can be worked up simply and easy! it only using a few rectangles, some seaming, and a trim! it is a great project for those still new to the craft - great for an adventurous beginner. it is the perfect size and weight - not too chunky but soft, plush, and warm.

pattern includes sizes xs-3xl womens.

this is an easy level crochet pattern, and the techniques you will need to know are half double crochet, double crochet, front and back post double crochet, chain stitch, and slip stitch.
